name: objective_id_878
description: Find your way to Sloobludop with a collection of demons standing in your way!

name: objective_id_882
description: Help the Kuo-toa while you try to barter for a boat.

name: objective_id_883
description: Help the Kuo-toa while you help a few straggler prisoners to safety.

name: objective_id_249
description: You've saved the world, but Strahd is patient. Eternity is just a drop of time after all.

name: objective_id_254
description: Help a dwarf reclaim a mine while dealing with Mongrelfolk!

name: objective_id_597
description: Enter the Twilight Grove surrounded by the mists of Ravenloft.

name: objective_id_622
description: Head deeper into Undermountain, as the mists of Ravenolft encroach!

name: objective_id_627
description: Defeat the nightmare version of Ireena that Strahd has staged within Alterdeep!

name: objective_id_632
description: Head into the wastelands and face Strahd head-on.

name: objective_id_637
description: Head into Lulu's memories to confront the waves of Strahd's Zombies!

name: objective_id_682
description: Help a pair of farmers deal with a deluge of uninvited Barovian guests.

name: objective_id_804
description: Enter Ten-Towns and defeat a squad of twig blights from Ravenloft!

name: objective_id_809
description: Head to Termalaine and try not to think of the danger to come.

name: objective_id_887
description: Head off in the nautiloid to try and stop the Rime.

name: objective_id_888
description: Head off in the nautiloid with a speaker in tow.

name: objective_id_892
description: Continue to hunt for The Codicil of White, while Auril prepares to end your advances.

name: objective_id_893
description: Continue to hunt for The Codicil of White with Auril ready for you this time.

name: objective_id_897
description: Take the Codicil of White to the Reghed Glacier, and try to unlock the mysteries held within.

name: objective_id_898
description: Take the Codicil of White to the Reghed Glacier with your most perceptive Champions.

name: objective_id_902
description: Continue to explore the Caves of Hunger, with a mad vampire gnoll on your tail.

name: objective_id_903
description: Continue to explore the Caves of Hunger, with a mad vampire gnoll freaking you out.

name: objective_id_687
description: You awake in the underdark, cursed by choices made by an unseen foe!

name: objective_id_879
description: Find your way to Sloobludop with Bubbles by your side!

name: objective_id_381
description: Help Artus find clues with a friend from the future.

name: objective_id_386
description: Race Valindra to Mezro with the 9 Trickster Gods by your side!

name: objective_id_172
description: Escort a mysterious noble while Baeloth summons some fancy friends to entertain us!

name: objective_id_233
description: Protect the hidden lords of waterdeep while protecting your panda from a pirate!

name: objective_id_642
description: Follow Lulu's dreams while Tiamat's chromatic dragons slow your progress!

name: objective_id_647
description: Follow Lulu's cries across Avernus with a distracting Bubbles and Cinnamon at your side!

name: objective_id_829
description: Explore a rumor about invisible dwarves, while dealing with vampire gnolls!

name: objective_id_834
description: Learn what you can while fancy red pandas attempt to 'entertain' you.

name: objective_id_928
displayName: The Rite of the Arcane Octad
description: Explore the ancient city of Ythryn while the remainder of its defenders try to keep its secrets hidden!

name: objective_id_929
description: Explore the ancient city of Ythryn while a group of Nothics attempt to assist you.

name: objective_id_933
description: Search the city for more Arcane Octad clues while learning more about the destruction of Ythryn.

name: objective_id_934
description: Search the city while taking time to try and understand the magical mysteries hidden within.

name: objective_id_918
description: Head to Mantol-Derith, to learn more about the demonic incursion into the Underdark.

name: objective_id_919
description: Head to Mantol-Derith, while dealing with a flood of Spore Servants!

name: objective_id_923
description: Explore Mantol-Derith while you discover the reason behind the inter-faction war.

name: objective_id_924
description: Explore Mantol-Derith with the Zhentarim watching your every move.
